title: Construction and Maintenance of Physical Facilities
content:
Construction and Maintenance of Physical Facilities

State Regulations
§ 14-1.170 - Floors
§ 14-1.171 - Walls and ceilings
§ 14-1.172 - Cleaning; general requirements
§ 14-1.173 - Cleaning of floor cleaning tools
§ 14-1.174 - Lighting
§ 14-1.175 - Ventilation
§ 14-1.176 - Dressing rooms and areas
§ 14-1.177 - Locker area

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
